Package com.mcgath.rj

Class Summary
Comment A single LJ comment.
DumpFileHandler Handler for XML parsing of dump file
GlobalState Global state for the journal (friends, etc.)
IndexFile This class is responsible for the creation of the index.html file that has links to all the entry files.
LJTagCleaner This takes lj and lj-cut tags and cleans them up.
Post A LiveJournal post (or "event")
ResurrectedJournal Main command line class for RJ
Stylesheet Handles the copying of the CSS stylesheet to the output directory.
User This class encapsulates the user identity and supports login
XMLDumpFile This class controls the writing of the XML file to multiple output files
